name: webxicon
short_description: Webxicon is a PHP/SQLITE viewer for SIL Lexicon data. It doesn't ship with language data, but includes an import tool for Toolbox databases. It was designed to run on lighttpd, making it installable on jailbroken iPhones, but isn't platform specifi
